meanings.definition: To wash (denim) with pumice stones to give it a faded, worn appearance.
meanings.sent1: She stonewashes her jeans to make them look old and soft.
meanings.sent2: The factory stonewashes denim to create trendy, vintage-style clothing.
meanings.sent3: After she stonewashes her jeans, they look like they've been on many adventures.
meanings.sent4: The river stonewashes the pebbles, smoothing them over time.
meanings.sent5: The artist stonewashes the canvas to achieve a weathered effect.
